data.text: @SenMikeLee The SAVE act will suppress...nobody.  It will disenfranchise nobody. It WILL ensure that only citizens can vote. THAT is why the Democrats are scrambling so hard to stop it.

@SenMikeLee Why does the US have universal healthcare?
Put that list and watch the GOP go crazy and talk about the evils of “socialism” - like watching rabid dogs 😂😂😂😂
@carebearstare12 @SenMikeLee Well you have a lot of time. Go get your paperwork in order. If you are legal, you have an ID plain and simple and you can bring that to vote! STOP THE BS

@SenMikeLee Our elections are full of fraud because the dems can't run on their policies. High taxes, high illegal immigration, high abortion rates, high crime, men in women sports...they're a bunch of lunatics! They can't win without cheating like hell
@SenMikeLee We have voter ID laws. Both state and Federal. Specially for federal elections. Run by the States!  Not the President
@SenMikeLee Dude please take like an hour off of this app, no one wants to hear you speak. We hate you and so does your family

@Chriscck369 @SenMikeLee @TheDemocrats @GOP And yet the democrat states won’t give that data to the federal government. 

Please smarten up for the love of God and country!
